TextDataReview: I think there are alot food court or resteruant nearby that just have much better menu than our school canteen
The security is great. Along with the big space for enough students to park the vehicle but the down side is that it cost too much fee.
The receiptionist have done a great services guiding the freshman to experience their first couple months in school
Tuition is acceptable compare to other big universities interm of service and quality education not to mention the scholarship that paragon has offered to fresh highschool graduated.
